text: In PoolProperties, the default value for maxIdle is Integer.MAX_VALUE and the default for maxActive is 100.  This results in a warning message being logged and the value for maxIdle set to match maxActive on lines 393/394 of ConnectionPool.  The default for maxIdle should match that of maxActive.
creator: mpassell@grovehillsoftware.com
mpassell@grovehillsoftware.com
text:
Created attachment 25424
default value for maxIdle matches maxActive

Here's a patch.  If there are any problems applying it, it just involves changing line 50 of PoolProperties.java to:

protected int maxIdle = maxActive;

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the patch. It has been applied to trunk.
